item.title: Valla Rave 2019
item.description: Worked as stage technician with the wonderful MBN group. Built the stage, programmed and ran the lightshow using a Martin M1 HD. Photos below are from the event, taken by Emil Strömblad (used with permission). Valla rave 2019 1
